GS24vakyp_su:2: based on the edition by Wilhelm Rau, Wiesbaden 1977
GS24vakyp_su:190: anyaḥ kaś cin na vidyate Vp_2.346d
GS24vakyp_su:281: ayam asyām iyaṃ tv asmād Vp_3,7.19c
GS24vakyp_su:413: asaṃś ca nāsteḥ kartā syād Vp_3,3.48c
GS24vakyp_su:464: āgamā iva ke cit tu Vp_2.192c
GS24vakyp_su:479: ātmabhedo na cet kaś cid Vp_2.213a
GS24vakyp_su:527: āvṛttyā na tu sa granthaḥ Vp_1.84c
GS24vakyp_su:614: upakāro na kaś ca na Vp_3,3.71b
GS24vakyp_su:648: ū ity etad abhinnaṃ ca Vp_2.101a
GS24vakyp_su:652: ṛjv etad asyety etac ca Vp_3,6.22c
GS24vakyp_su:825: kaś cid eva guṇo dravye Vp_3,1.73a
GS24vakyp_su:833: kasya cit kena cid yasyāṃ Vp_3,3.7c
GS24vakyp_su:837: kā cit pravartate kā cin Vp_2.370c
GS24vakyp_su:838: kā cid eva hi sāvasthā Vp_3,3.7a
GS24vakyp_su:884: kāṃ cid eva kriyāṃ prati Vp_2.384b
GS24vakyp_su:891: kiṃ cid eva kva cid rūpaṃ Vp_2.129c
GS24vakyp_su:919: ke cid āhuh katham ca na Vp_3,7.34d
GS24vakyp_su:920: ke cid icchanti na tv atra Vp_3,1.65c
GS24vakyp_su:944: kaiś cit kathaṃ cid ākhyātā Vp_2.171c
GS24vakyp_su:945: kaiś cit kathaṃ cid uddiṣṭau Vp_2.178c
GS24vakyp_su:946: kaiś cit tv avayavair dṛṣṭair Vp_2.156c
GS24vakyp_su:1040: kriyāṃ vā kālam eva vā Vp_3,7.34b
GS24vakyp_su:1045: kva cit kiṃ cid vivakṣyate Vp_3,7.2d
GS24vakyp_su:1050: kva cit sāṃnidhyam apy eṣāṃ Vp_2.304c
GS24vakyp_su:1100: gotrāṇy eva tu tāny āhuḥ Vp_2.365a
GS24vakyp_su:1106: gośabdo na tv asau teṣāṃ Vp_2.153c
GS24vakyp_su:1107: gauṇa ity ucyate kva cit Vp_2.274d
GS24vakyp_su:1117: gaur ity eva svarūpād vā Vp_2.175a
GS24vakyp_su:1133: ghaṭa ity api yaj jñānaṃ Vp_3,1.109c
GS24vakyp_su:1169: chabdāt tac ca na bhidyate Vp_3,2.11d
GS24vakyp_su:1200: jātir vā dravyam eva vā Vp_3,1.2b
GS24vakyp_su:1252: jñāne vā saṃśayaḥ kva cit Vp_3,3.2b
GS24vakyp_su:1270: tac ca nityam iti smṛtam Vp_3,2.1d
GS24vakyp_su:1281: tat karma na punar bhavet Vp_3,7.167b
GS24vakyp_su:1420: tad abhūd asti neti vā Vp_2.429b
GS24vakyp_su:1437: tad upeyāt kathaṃ ca na Vp_2.460d
GS24vakyp_su:1440: tad ekaṃ tat pṛthak pṛthak Vp_3,2.13b
GS24vakyp_su:1476: tan nāsti vidyate tac ca Vp_3,2.13a
GS24vakyp_su:1548: tasya prāṇe ca yā śaktir Vp_1.121a
GS24vakyp_su:1643: te liṅgaiś ca svaśabdaiś ca Vp_1.26a
GS24vakyp_su:1670: tair vyastaiś ca samastaiś ca Vp_2.384c
GS24vakyp_su:1803: dvidhā kaiś cit padaṃ bhinnaṃ Vp_3,1.1a
GS24vakyp_su:1827: dhātus tābhyāṃ vinā kva cit Vp_2.230d
GS24vakyp_su:1851: na grahe kva cid āśritaḥ Vp_3,1.61b
GS24vakyp_su:1855: na ca sad bhidyate tataḥ Vp_3,7.109d
GS24vakyp_su:1866: na cet tadvan na jāyate Vp_3,3.44d
GS24vakyp_su:1870: na jātv akartṛkaṃ kaś cid Vp_1.148a
GS24vakyp_su:1883: na tad asti na tan nāsti Vp_3,2.12a
GS24vakyp_su:1884: na tad utpadyate kiṃ cid Vp_3,1.25a
GS24vakyp_su:1885: na tad ekaṃ na tat pṛthak Vp_3,2.12b
GS24vakyp_su:1893: na tasyātmā kva cit sthitaḥ Vp_2.441b
GS24vakyp_su:1901: na tu varṇeṣv ayaṃ kramaḥ Vp_2.51d
GS24vakyp_su:1905: na tv avasthāntaraṃ kiṃ cid Vp_3,3.63c
GS24vakyp_su:1913: na pūrvo na paraś ca saḥ Vp_1.49b
GS24vakyp_su:1928: na varṇo na padaṃ bhavet Vp_2.29b
GS24vakyp_su:1932: na vāg vadati karhi cit Vp_1.163d
GS24vakyp_su:1935: na vinā saṃkhyayā kaś cit Vp_3,1.51a
GS24vakyp_su:1936: na virodho 'sti kaś ca na Vp_2.179d
GS24vakyp_su:1939: na vyāpāro 'sti kaś ca na Vp_3,3.28b
GS24vakyp_su:1952: na sattvaṃ na ca nāstitā Vp_3,1.21b
GS24vakyp_su:2087: niyamas tatra na tv evaṃ Vp_2.167c
GS24vakyp_su:2089: niyamaḥ kva cid eva yaḥ Vp_3,3.8b
GS24vakyp_su:2185: paṭhyate kiṃ cid eva tu Vp_2.259b
GS24vakyp_su:2308: pūrvam as yeti ṣaṣṭhy eva Vp_3,6.21c
GS24vakyp_su:2503: pravibhāgo na kaś ca na Vp_1.74d
GS24vakyp_su:2544: prāg avastheti na hy etad Vp_3,3.79c
GS24vakyp_su:2869: yac ca ko 'yam iti praśne Vp_2.271a
GS24vakyp_su:2874: yac cāpy ekaṃ padaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ Vp_2.270a
GS24vakyp_su:2894: yatra draṣṭā ca dṛśyaṃ ca Vp_3,3.72a
GS24vakyp_su:2978: yad asaj jāyate sad vā Vp_3,7.49a
GS24vakyp_su:2983: yadā tu jātiḥ śaktir vā Vp_3,1.77a
GS24vakyp_su:3075: ye taṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ prati Vp_2.333b
GS24vakyp_su:3103: yo yasya svam iva jñānaṃ Vp_1.39a
GS24vakyp_su:3203: varṇās te ca pade yadi Vp_2.28b
GS24vakyp_su:3487: vyatiriktaṃ na kiṃ ca na Vp_1.73d
GS24vakyp_su:3655: śabdāś ca na pṛthak tataḥ Vp_3,2.16b
GS24vakyp_su:3708: śāstraiḥ kaś ca na vidyate Vp_1.150b
GS24vakyp_su:3787: satyaṃ yat tatra sā jātir Vp_3,1.32c
GS24vakyp_su:3794: sad ity etat tu yad vākyaṃ Vp_2.429a
GS24vakyp_su:3812: sa bāhyaṃ vastv iti jñātaḥ Vp_2.132c
GS24vakyp_su:3827: samāpto naiva vā kva cit Vp_2.442b
GS24vakyp_su:3872: sarvadā sa tu san dharmaḥ Vp_3,7.29c
GS24vakyp_su:4035: saṃbandhe sati yat tv anyad Vp_2.42a
GS24vakyp_su:4124: sā ca nityān na bhidyate Vp_3,3.34d
GS24vakyp_su:4161: sā nityā sā mahān ātmā Vp_3,1.34c
GS24vakyp_su:4344: svaṃ rūpam iti kaiś cit tu Vp_1.69a
